title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Number of employees has increased over the Year.
Number of employees is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, gradually increasing from 2012 to 2015, and lastly roughly constant from 2015 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
Max Number of employees about 16400.0 was recorded at Year 2019
Min Number of employees about 3000.0 was recorded at Year 2009
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2017.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2018 to 2019.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2018.
